mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, STAY_AMOUNT, STAY_DAY, REFUND_AMOUNT, REFUND_DATE, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_STATUS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_refund (ID, APP_ID, STAY_AMOUNT, STAY_DAY, REFUND_AMOUNT, REFUND_DATE, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_STATUS, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stayAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stayDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{refundDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_apply_refund
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAY_AMOUNT = #{stayAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
STAY_DAY = #{stayDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REFUND_AMOUNT = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REFUND_DATE = #{refundDate,jdbcType=DATE},
APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_apply_refund set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAY_AMOUNT = #{stayAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, STAY_DAY = #{stayDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REFUND_AMOUNT = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REFUND_DATE = #{refundDate,jdbcType=DATE}, APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ID as id, a.APP_ID as appId, d.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, b.NAME as custName, b.ID_NO as idNo, a.STAY_AMOUNT as stayAmount, a.REFUND_AMOUNT as refundAmount, e.DICT_DATA_NAME as applyStatus, a.APPLY_COMMENT as applyComment, c.NAME_ as taskName, f.ACCOUNT_NAME as assignee, a.PROC_INST_ID as procInstId, g.PROC_DEF_ID_ as procDefId from T_APPLY_REFUND a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join ACT_RU_TASK c on a.PROC_INST_ID = c.PROC_INST_ID_ left join T_SIGN_CONTRACT d on a.APP_ID = d.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA e on a.APPLY_STATUS = e.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_ACCOUNT f on c.ASSIGNEE_ = f.ACCOUNT_ID left join ACT_HI_PROCINST g on a.PROC_INST_ID = g.PROC_INST_ID_ where a.CREATE_ID = #{createId}
